item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 27, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. I discovered mysterious hidden signals on a public radio channel (2013) [video] (108 points | 18 comments)
2. Shrunked JavaScript monorepo Git size by 94% (31 points | discuss)
3. Should elephants have the same rights as people? A Colorado court may decide (7 points | 1 comment)
4. James Webb Telescope discovers some quasars that seem to exist in isolation (26 points | discuss)
5. Typeset: An HTML pre-proces­sor for web ty­pog­ra­phy (11 points | 4 comments)
6. Canvas Fingerprinting (65 points | 50 comments)
7. Understanding Round Robin DNS (260 points | 98 comments)
8. How JPEG XL compares to other image codecs (83 points | 26 comments)
9. How 'Factorio' seduced Silicon Valley and me (176 points | 204 comments)
10. ZombAIs: From Prompt Injection to C2 with Claude Computer Use (108 points | 48 comments)
11. Debugging my wife's alarm clock (19 points | 2 comments)
12. First scientific study of the Paris catacombs (7 points | discuss)
13. Fundamentals of Radiance Cascades (83 points | 21 comments)
14. Moonshine, the new state of the art for speech to text (14 points | 2 comments)
15. How the human brain contends with the strangeness of zero (15 points | 4 comments)
16. Using LLMs to enhance our testing practices (104 points | 46 comments)
17. Using a BCI with LLM for enabling ALS patients to speak again with family (41 points | 14 comments)
18. Tell HN: GpuOwl/PRPLL, GPU software used to find the largest prime number (44 points | 14 comments)
19. Olivetti’s Ivrea (46 points | 9 comments)
20. The Fediverse is getting its own TikTok competitor called Loops (9 points | 2 comments)
21. Codeberg Reconsidering OSI License Approval in Terms of Use (5 points | discuss)
22. Carma (YC W24) hiring founding SWEs (remote) to build the next Uber for auto repair ( | hide)
23. A brief history of Mac firmware (30 points | 3 comments)
24. Order and orient the keys on your keychain (49 points | 59 comments)
25. Goodhart's law isn't as useful as you might think (2023) (65 points | 40 comments)
26. The Mindlessness of Ostensibly Thoughtful Action (1978) [pdf] (39 points | 5 comments)
27. Long wave radio fans mourn fading frequencies (2023) (61 points | 31 comments)
28. Deep dive: the instability of op-amps (95 points | 36 comments)
29. Migrating birds find refuge in pop-up habitats (10 points | discuss)
30. California is torn between clashing Anglo traditions? (46 points | 50 comments)
